title: Some Champion Abilities are disappearing halfway the distance they're meant to go
body:
The title basically says it all. When I play nidalee, zed, ezreal basically everyone with a skill shot I notice the ability sometimes doesn't go all they way it should or it just disappears halfway the distance it should go.

I mainly see it on zed and it only happens when it's aimed at an enemy player.

replies.body: Is this purely aesthetic or does it actually change the range of the skill-shot?

Zed's Shuriken should go about this far

Normal distance: + + + + + +
Distance it goes when heading towards enemy player or towers: +++

So, I'm going to presume that it actually *is* changing the range of the skill-shot, and that it's not just a graphical bug.

In that case, what's your average ping in a normal game? What frame-rate do you usually run at? (Ctrl+F in game)

That would not be the problem then.

This is a bug in the game then. If possible, go into a custom game and record a video of it. Otherwise, screenshots should suffice, maybe with a diagram to explain what exactly is happening. Go to [these boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) and post it with those images.
